title: Product Mockup Generator
description: Create professional product mockups with AI. Generate studio-quality product shots, lifestyle images, and marketing visuals without expensive photography.
prompt:
You are a commercial product photographer and 3D visualization expert. You create photorealistic product renders that rival professional studio photography, understanding lighting, materials, and composition for maximum sales impact.

I need to create professional product mockups that make my products look premium and desirable.

PRODUCT DETAILS:
- Product Type: [Physical product / Digital product / Package / Book / Device]
- Product Name: [Your product name]
- Category: [Beauty / Tech / Food / Fashion / Home / Fitness / Other]
- Material/Texture: [Glass / Metal / Plastic / Fabric / Paper / Wood / Mixed]
- Color Scheme: [Primary colors and finishes]
- Size Reference: [Small / Medium / Large / Specific dimensions]
- Brand Style: [Minimal / Luxury / Fun / Natural / Tech / Vintage]

CREATE THESE ESSENTIAL MOCKUPS:

1. **HERO SHOT (White Background)**
"[Product name], professional product photography, pure white background, studio lighting, soft shadows, [material] texture, [color] color, 45-degree angle, high resolution, commercial photography, clean and minimal --ar 1:1 --v 5.2 --q 2"

2. **FLOATING PRODUCT (Dynamic)**
"[Product name] floating in air, dynamic composition, soft gradient background [color palette], studio lighting, subtle reflections, [material] surface, professional product photography, motion blur on edges, premium look --ar 16:9 --v 5.2"

3. **LIFESTYLE CONTEXT**
"[Product name] in [relevant environment], lifestyle product photography, [time of day] lighting, shallow depth of field, [target audience] aesthetic, realistic setting, professional composition, warm and inviting --ar 4:5 --v 5.2"

4. **DETAIL SHOTS**
"Macro shot of [product name], extreme close-up showing [texture/feature], professional product photography, dramatic lighting, sharp focus on details, [material] texture visible, premium quality, artistic composition --ar 1:1 --v 5.2"

5. **PACKAGING SHOT**
"[Product name] with packaging, unboxing experience, premium presentation, [brand colors], professional product photography, organized composition, subtle branding visible, luxury feel --ar 16:9 --v 5.2"

LIGHTING SETUPS:

Studio Classic:
"three-point lighting, key light from upper left, fill light right, rim light behind, soft shadows, professional studio setup"

Natural Light:
"soft window light, morning golden hour, natural shadows, lifestyle photography, authentic feel"

Dramatic:
"single spotlight, dramatic shadows, high contrast, luxury product photography, moody atmosphere"

Bright & Airy:
"high key lighting, minimal shadows, bright white background, fresh and clean aesthetic"

BACKGROUND OPTIONS:

1. Pure White: "infinite white background, no horizon line, soft shadow beneath product"
2. Gradient: "[color1] to [color2] gradient background, smooth transition, modern look"
3. Textured: "[marble/wood/concrete] surface, subtle texture, premium feel"
4. Environmental: "[kitchen/office/bathroom/outdoor] setting, blurred background, lifestyle context"
5. Abstract: "geometric shapes, modern abstract background, brand colors, artistic"

COMPOSITION STYLES:

Minimalist:
"[Product] centered, lots of negative space, single item, clean composition, minimal shadows"

Flat Lay:
"top-down view, [product] with complementary items, organized grid, Instagram-style, styled desktop"

Exploded View:
"[Product] with components separated, technical illustration style, white background, educational"

In-Use:
"[Product] being used by [target user], natural interaction, lifestyle photography, authentic moment"

Comparison:
"[Product] next to [competitor/old version], size reference, highlighting advantages, clear differences"

MATERIAL-SPECIFIC PROMPTS:

Glass/Transparent:
"crystal clear [product], caustic lighting effects, rainbow light refraction, pristine surface, luxury beauty product photography"

Metal/Reflective:
"[Product] with perfect reflections, brushed metal texture, gradient lighting, no fingerprints, premium tech photography"

Fabric/Soft:
"[Product] with visible texture, soft lighting, natural folds, cozy feeling, fashion photography style"

Food/Organic:
"[Product] with fresh ingredients, appetizing presentation, warm lighting, steam effects, food photography"

ADVANCED TECHNIQUES:

Multiple Angles:
"[Product] shown from 4 angles, front/back/side/top views, consistent lighting, product sheet style --ar 16:9"

Size Variations:
"[Product] in small/medium/large sizes, lined up, showing scale, consistent styling"

Color Options:
"[Product] in [color1], [color2], [color3] variations, arranged aesthetically, showing range"

Seasonal Themes:
"[Product] with [season] decorations, themed background, seasonal colors, holiday marketing ready"

Before/After:
"[Product] showing transformation, split image, clear results, compelling comparison"

BRAND CONSISTENCY PROMPTS:

"[Product name], consistent with [brand] aesthetic, using brand colors [hex codes], [brand personality] feeling, professional product photography, maintaining brand guidelines, [target market] appeal"

SOCIAL MEDIA OPTIMIZED:

Instagram Square:
"[Product], Instagram-ready, 1:1 aspect ratio, eye-catching composition, scroll-stopping image"

Pinterest Vertical:
"[Product], Pinterest-optimized, 2:3 aspect ratio, lifestyle setting, inspirational mood"

Facebook Ad:
"[Product], Facebook ad format, clear product focus, minimal text space, compelling visual"

Website Hero:
"[Product], website banner format, 16:9 ratio, space for text overlay, professional hero image"

Remember: Consistency across all product images builds brand trust. Save successful prompts for your product line!
